# Work Planner Project - Next.js with Authentication

## Project Overview
Production-ready Next.js work planner application with enterprise-level security, performance, and features.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (JavaScript, App Router)
- Tailwind CSS
- MongoDB with Mongoose
- JWT Authentication
- Nodemailer for email
- Node-cron for scheduled tasks
- Bcrypt for password hashing

## Completed Features âœ…
- [x] Complete project setup and scaffolding
- [x] User authentication (register, login, logout)
- [x] Email verification system
- [x] Task CRUD operations
- [x] Due date tracking and status management
- [x] Automated email reminders (hourly checks for tasks due within 1 hour)
- [x] Dark-themed responsive UI
- [x] Password visibility toggle
- [x] Resend verification for unverified users

## Production Enhancements âœ…
